name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JoVE: Accelerate research with scientific videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your research by quickly finding scientific protocol videos mapped to your research articles from Google Scholar, PubMed, or other popular research sites.

With the JoVE Chrome Extension, you can:

üîç Instantly find research protocol videos by searching the JoVE library from any website
üé• Get related protocol videos for search results on Google Scholar and PubMed
üî¨ Discover educational concept videos to support foundational topics for your research

Install now to enrich your daily research with interactive and engaging visual content.

For more information about JoVE, visit www.jove.com
